subject: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are accepting your refinance appication
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire TONIGHT):
$383,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://icvbmitecat.com/
